item.title: Vue Functional Component
item.description: In Vue3, functional components have been greatly enhanced, and there are two specific performances Simplifying the API h available everywhere and slot revision, resulting the wider application Therefore, under Vue3, you can see that the use of functional components has increased a lot. For example, naive-ui. You can find a lot of use of functional components from its documentation. Indeed it’s very useful in some cases. But correspondingly, there are some misunderstandings in the use of function components.
